諬字的基本解释

諬
qǐ
古同“启”。

諬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qǐ］
［《廣韻》康禮切，上薺，溪。］
“唘1”的今字。“啔1”的今字。亦作“啟1”。亦作“闙1”。
(1)开；打开。
(2)分开。
(3)开拓；开创。
(4)通；开通。
(5)开导；启发。
(6)指门户；道桥。参见“啓塞”。
(7)古时指立春、立夏。
(8)始；开始。
(9)招致；引发。
(10)启奏；禀告。
(11)泛指奏疏，公文，书函。
(12)先锋。
(13)引申指先进的，前头的。
(14)指军队的左翼。
(15)跪；危坐。
(16)视。后作“”。
(17)马之一种，称前右足白者。
(18)姓。

諬字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　諬； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1171第02
【字彙】與啓同。

諬字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
諬字的起名意思

暂无。

Framing
Basic explanation of words
Framing
qǐ
Gu Tong "Qi".
Framing
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [qǐ]
["Guangyun" Kang Liqie, upper water chestnut, stream. ]
The present character of "唘1". The present character of "啔1". Also known as "Revelation 1". Also known as "Qui 1".
(1) Open; open.
(2) Separate.
(3) Pioneering; pioneering.
(4) Open; open.
(5) Enlighten; enlighten.
(6) Refers to the portal; Daoqiao. See "opening".
(7) In ancient times, it referred to Lichun and Lixia.
(8) Begin; begin.
(9) Incurred; triggered.
(10) Initiation; report.
(11) Refers to memorials, official documents, and letters in general.
(12) Pioneer.
(13) The extension refers to the advanced and the first.
(14) Refers to the left wing of the army.
(15) Kneel; sit in danger.
(16) Depending on. It is later called "".
(17) A kind of horse, which is called white front right foot.
(18) Last name.
Framing
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　諬; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 1171 02
[Vocabulary] Same as Qi.
